primary_trope.name: countdown
primary_trope.hook_text: Where UCI Gravel Suisse breaks you

beats.label: HOOK
beats.narration: Here's where UCI Gravel Suisse breaks you. 68 mi. Zone by zone.
beats.text_on_screen: UCI Gravel Suisse — Where It Hurts
beats.visual: Full route map, then zoom into first zone
beats.editing_note: Start with full route visible, then rapid zoom in. Ominous music hit. Avatar suffering face.

beats.label: ZONE 1: Mile 6
beats.narration: Mile 6. Ollon Wake-Up Call. First off-road climb hits 10% average gradient for 3 miles. Your legs haven't warmed up, but the Alps don't care about your preparation routine.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling 50% paved / 50% unpaved alpine terrain. Starts flat in Rhone Valley, transitions to steep forest climbs and high-altitude gravel roads. Features a brutal 20% gradient section on Route des Chaux before the Col de la Croix finish.

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 1 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 2: Mile 31
beats.narration: Mile 31. Valley Floor Intermission. Flat roads through the Rhone Valley where you'll foolishly think this race is manageable. Use this time to eat everything in your pockets. you won't get another chance.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling 50% paved / 50% unpaved alpine terrain. Starts flat in Rhone Valley, transitions to steep forest climbs and high-altitude gravel roads. Features a brutal 20% gradient section on Route des Chaux before the Col de la Croix finish.

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 2 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 3: Mile 49
beats.narration: Mile 49. The Real Race Begins. Everything changes at kilometer 80 when pavement ends and the woods swallow you whole. From here it's 2.3 thousand meters of climbing to the finish with no mercy.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling 50% paved / 50% unpaved alpine terrain. Starts flat in Rhone Valley, transitions to steep forest climbs and high-altitude gravel roads. Features a brutal 20% gradient section on Route des Chaux before the Col de la Croix finish.

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 3 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: ZONE 4: Mile 58
beats.narration: Mile 58. Route des Chaux Punishment. Twenty percent gradients on loose gravel through dense forest. Your bike becomes a hiking accessory and your quads become strangers.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: gravel cycling 50% paved / 50% unpaved alpine terrain. Starts flat in Rhone Valley, transitions to steep forest climbs and high-altitude gravel roads. Features a brutal 20% gradient section on Route des Chaux before the Col de la Croix finish.

beats.editing_note: Zone marker 4 appears on map. Progressive color intensity (green→yellow→red).

beats.label: CTA + LOOP
beats.narration: Full suffering breakdown on the site. Link in bio.
beats.visual: Full map with all zones lit up
beats.editing_note: Loop design: end with zoomed-out map that connects back to the opening frame.
beats.engagement_question: Which zone would end your race? Comment the mile marker.

thumbnail_prompt: South Park style cartoon cyclist in agony, route map background, red zone markers, 'UCI Gravel Suisse' text --ar 9:16 --cref [CHARACTER_URL]

cross_platform_notes.tiktok: Post natively. Design for loop replay. Trending audio optional.
cross_platform_notes.instagram_reels: Same cut. Add location tag for race area.
cross_platform_notes.youtube_shorts: Same cut. Pin comment with link to full breakdown.
cross_platform_notes.twitter_x: Post thumbnail still + hot take as tweet text.

production_checklist: [ ] B-roll sourced (check broll_sources in each beat)
[ ] Music track selected (check BPM targets per beat)
[ ] Loop point tested (final frame → opening frame)
[ ] Test 3-second hold rate with fresh eyes
